body.p: Yours of the 16th ult is to hand and contents noted and in obedience to directions I Give you the names of the Justices of Floyd County as far as remembered also the name of the Clerk and County Judge

(1) County Judge,, James P. Harris commissioned in place of David Cooly.
County & Circuit Court Clerk
2 John G Johns
Justices of the Peace
3 James P. Stephens
4 J,, R,, Langley

The old Justices are all acting in all the districts except in the 2d 5th & 8 districts; those districts you know in which no elections have been held the old Justives hold their offices until their sucessor sucessors are Elected and qualified see Revised statute Page 431& 2 and constitution of Ky Page 138 sect 34 I am unable to give you all the names of the Justices before whoever Pension & Bounty Claims have been Seen to; the two above named I remember four having their names
I desire your official Certificate to the official Character of each of the within and as may thus as your office shows as commissioned in 1861 except in districts Nos 25 & 8 in which Elections have been since held Also your official certificate for John G. Johns the clerk and James P. Harris the Co Judge this is all the information I am able to give you, hoping to hear from you soon favourably I

am Dear Sir very
Respectfully your
friend
John M. Burns

To
James R. Page
Asst secratay
Frankfort
Ky
